channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vance's comments about European peacekeeping plan for Ukraine draw ire abroad
item.description: Vice President Vance said the best security guarantee for Ukraine is to sign a mineral deal with the United States.

item.title: Fargo has an election method that helps mainstream candidates. North Dakota lawmakers may ban it
Watch: What did we learn from Meghan's new Netflix show?
item.description: The BBC's Daniela Relph takes a look at the Duchess of Sussex's new lifestyle series, 'With love, Meghan'.

item.title: How will Trump justify the stocks plunge reacting to his tariffs?
item.description: President Trump is set to address both chambers of Congress as his tariffs spook investors and drive down stocks. CBS MoneyWatch correspondent Kelly O...

item.title: Serbian parliament erupts into chaos as smoke grenades, tear gas clash ensues
item.description: At least three lawmakers were injured after Serbian opposition members threw smoke bombs and flares in the Balkan country's parliamentary chamber over...

item.title: Supreme Court ruling makes it harder for EPA to police sewage discharges
item.description: The Supreme Court's decision is the latest in which conservative justices have reined in pollution control efforts.

item.title: Despite weather concerns, New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras Day and bids farewell to Carnival season
item.description: Thousands of revelers in outlandish costumes filled the streets of New Orleans as the city celebrated Mardi Gras Day despite the threat of storms.

item.title: West Texans, Mennonites at center of measles outbreak choose medical freedom over vaccine mandates
Mar 4: CBS News 24/7, 1pm ET
item.description: U.S. tariffs on Mexico and Canada go into effect and levies on China raised; House Transportation subcommittee holds hearing on state of air traffic c...

item.title: Fears Ukraine defences will last only months without US
item.description: One Ukrainian soldier said the impact of the US aid pause would be "measured in lives"

item.title: Canada and China say the fentanyl crisis is only a 'pretext' for Trump's new tariffs
item.description: Canadian and Chinese officials say they were already helping reduce fentanyl smuggling. Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said fentanyl crossing the north...

item.title: U.S. stock markets plunge as Trump's tariffs spark fears about a trade war
item.description: U.S. stock markets plummeted on Tuesday morning as a new global trade war began.

item.title: The CFPB drops its case against payment app Zelle, in another sign of a Trump pivot
item.description: It's the latest lawsuit abandoned by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau since Trump appointees have taken over at the bureau.

item.title: Father tries to block daughter's euthanasia in landmark Spanish case
item.description: It's the first time that a case has gone to court since a euthanasia law was introduced in Spain in 2021.

item.title: US stock markets fall after tariffs spark trade war fears
item.description: Canada's Prime Minister Justin said Donald Trump's decision to impose import taxes was "very dumb".

item.title: American businesses reel as Trump tariffs start to bite
item.description: Business owners across the country worry they will also suffer the impact from President Trump's tariffs on imports from Mexico, Canada and China.

item.title: How will Trump address rising prices as new tariffs take form?
item.description: President Trump's tariffs on goods from Canada, Mexico and China are bound to increase prices for Americans. CBS News' Weijia Jiang reports as Mr. Tru...

item.title: Zelensky ready to work under Trump's 'strong leadership'
item.description: The Ukrainian leader says his team is ready to negotiate after a diplomatic breakdown last week.
